preference.name: MES_3DPDF_UPDATE_WORKFLOW_LOG_FOLDER
preference.preference_description: Specifies the folder name where all log file datasets are created when updating 3D PDF documents. If any 3D PDF request fails during the workflow, a new dataset is created in this folder with the generated log file. Valid Values: Accepts an existing Teamcenter folder name.
